an10.65:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma sariputto magadhesu viharati nalakagamake.
an10.65:1.2: Atha kho samandakani paribbajako yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
an10.65:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho samandakani paribbajako ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an10.65:2.1: “Kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, sukham, kim dukkhan”ti?
an10.65:2.3: Abhinibbattiya, avuso, sati idam dukkham patikankham—
an10.65:2.4: sitam unham jighaccha pipasa uccaro passavo aggisamphasso dandasamphasso satthasamphasso natipi mittapi sangamma samagamma rosenti.
an10.65:2.5: Abhinibbattiya, avuso, sati idam dukkham patikankham.
an10.65:2.6: Anabhinibbattiya, avuso, sati idam sukham patikankham—
an10.65:2.7: na sitam na unham na jighaccha na pipasa na uccaro na passavo na aggisamphasso na dandasamphasso na satthasamphasso natipi mittapi sangamma samagamma na rosenti.
an10.65:2.8: Anabhinibbattiya, avuso, sati idam sukham patikankhan”ti.
